title: Speakerboxx
body:
Sophistafunk, aristocats
Distinguished stars, clean up your acts
Pull up your pants, ladies and gents
Please, act like you got some sense
You know what I really wanna know?
Where do all the good girls go
What clubs they hang in?

Sorry. That's from the The Love Below... I was confused for a second there.

Mission: Allow the screen to be as close to the front wall as possible.
Task: Create a platform that allows the backstage speaker to stick out into the hallway.



Step 1: Build platform base.



Step 2: Build framing along the base.



Step 3: Cut out existing wall frame.



Step 4: Cap the newly cut studs.



Step 5: Build a header and reinforce with crutches.



Step 6: Box in the area where the speakerboxx will be inserted.



Step 7: Install platform and framing.



Step 8: Stabilize with supports.



Step 9: Build top framing.



Step 10: Mission accomplished. Pat yourself on the back.

NOTE: There was nothing funny in those pictures, but do I really have to be funny all the time? I mean, seriously?! Geez. I can't take this! The pressure... too much... must... go to... South... Africa!
author: Dan
